remarks: A consequence of relative atomicity.  ( ~ chrelat2i analog.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Feb-2012.)
statement:
hlrelat2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlrelat2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlrelat2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlrelat2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( -. X .<_ Y <-> E. p e. A ( p .<_ X /\ -. p .<_ Y ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d K p $.
$d X p $.
$d Y p $.
